author: Staff Reporter
text:
Over 200 jewellery shops in Puducherry remained closed on Thursday to protest against the Union Government’s rule for customers to provide PAN card details for transactions above Rs.2 lakh.

Around 225 small and major jewellery showrooms downed their shutters, according to a spokesperson of Association of Jewellery Owners.

A majority of customers were from rural areas and did not have PAN card.

The move would only affect the business, he said.
title: Jewellers protest against govt rule
